name: Undercover AD2025 Kei
description:
The game is about two detectives, one male the other female, investigating various murder cases in a hotel, also there is a cat for some reason.
Undercover AD2025 Kei (アンダーカバー Ａ．Ｄ．２０２５ Ｋｅｉ) is an Adventure game, developed by Pulse Interactive and published by Pulse Entertainment, which was released in Japan in 2000, good for a few laughs. it controls like Resident Evil but it's a shooty action game, you can also punch enemies with your police baton.
